name: Re:Retry (Wowie Jam)
description:
i spent 9 hours making this. i think it works on linux and mac, it might not. its basically a short "proof of concept" game if you can call it that. you can use WAS and D to move which is epic because being able to move in a video game is epic.

this is my first game that ive finished making so dont expect much thank you.
